segments.text: I see the boy stretching for the cookie jar, and I’m worried he’ll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s not even looking down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is completely oblivious to the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just drying that plate like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already pooling around her feet, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should shout a warning before this gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, but inside, it’s a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids will get away with the cookies before the stool tips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
